product_name: prAna Gomez Shirt Jacket - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Get the best of both worlds with the prAna Gomez shirt jacket. It has the comfort and warmth of a light jacket with the style of a classic corduroy shirt. 16-wale corduroy exterior is lined with soft sherpa fleece through the body; nylon lining in the sleeves allows the shirt jacket to slide on easily over layers. Light insulation in the sleeves combines with the sherpa fleece in the body to keep you warm on chilly days. A touch of spandex gives the piece easy stretch for comfort. Snap-flap chest pockets. The prAna Gomez shirt jacket has a standard fit. Closeout.
short_description: Get the best of both worlds with the prAna Gomez shirt jacket. It has the comfort and warmth of a light jacket with the style of a classic corduroy shirt.
